markdownRemark.html:
Yeah. It’s been literally a year since the last time I updated this website. And for good reason too. The only reason I’m writing this now is that after the turn of events with COVID-19, I’d like to reflect on what’s been going on in my life since almost exactly 1 year ago.

Since my last post, I was fortunate enough to complete an internship at LinkedIn and graduate from Georgia Tech. That’s it. But suffice to say the least, it’s been one wild ride. Here’s some photos from

frontmatter.description: It's been a while. Read this post to see how I reflected on this past year of events, and how I plan for future events.
frontmatter.title: I just graduated. What's next?
